Class ReminderNotification

java.lang.Object
ReminderNotification
All Implemented Interfaces:
INotification, IReminderNotification
public class ReminderNotification extends Object implements IReminderNotification
Implementation of IReminderNotification that handles scheduled reminders and notifications. Manages reminder scheduling, cancellation, and persistent notification logging.
Author:
Omar Sayed

  • Constructor Summary

    Description
    ReminderNotification(ReminderDataBase database)
    Constructs a reminderNotification instance and ensures the notification folder exists.

    • cancelNotification

      public void cancelNotification(int userId, int reminderId)
      Cancels a pending reminder notification before it triggers.
      Specified by:
      cancelNotification in interface IReminderNotification
      Parameters:
      userId - the ID of the user whose reminder should be canceled
      reminderId - the ID of the specific reminder to cancel

      Schedules a new reminder to trigger at the specified date/time.
      Specified by:

      Parameters:
      reminder - the Reminder object containing all scheduling details
